bike.description: Epic FSR M5 alloy, fully manipulated frame w/ new larger diameter/stiffer ORE DT/TT, FACT carbon shock link, sealed cartridge bearings, 100mm travel, replaceable derailleur hanger

components.description: Specialized AFR Shock w/ Flow Control valve, adjustable from HT firm to Trail Tune, air spring, adjustable rebound
Alloy collar w/ QR, 34.9mm clamp ID
Protective clear coat, derailleur hanger, reflectors, owners manual
